pages.text: The first thing you will need in order to create tools with this mod is a forge. To create one, you will first need some reinforced cobblestone.
You will then need to smelt some of your reinforced cobblestone down into reinforced stone.
Finally, you can now make yourself a basic forge out of the materials you just got.
To improve the forge and unlock the ability to make a weapon, you will need to create a saw, which you can then combine with your basic forge.
The other main thing you will need in order to create tools with this mod are some empty blueprints.
One component most tools will need, is the tool handle.
Weapons on the other hand mostly require weapon handles.
To create a pickaxe, you are going to need its respective tool head blueprint.
To create an axe, you are going to need its respective tool head blueprint.
To create a shovel, you are going to need its respective tool head blueprint.
To create a hoe, you are going to need its respective tool head blueprint.
To create a broadsword, you are going to need its respective tool head blueprint.
To create a broadsword, you are also going to need a wide guard blueprint.

After you have acquired your component blueprints, you can combine them with the material of your choice to get an actual component.$(br2)Do note that only one material is shown per recipe, however any tool material will work in its place.
